body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Royal Residences Support. My name is Joseph James. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Tammy. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I stayed at your hotel last week and unfortunately had an issue with the staff's friendliness.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that. To better assist you, could you please provide me with your room number during the stay and the date of your check-in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my room number was five six two zero and I checked in on July tenth.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Tammy. I will look into this matter for you.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate your help. I feel relieved knowing you're addressing this.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for bringing this to our attention, Tammy. If you have any other concerns, feel free to contact us. Have a great day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, have a great day too.
